definition: odd expression/funny looks/queer face/to grimace/to give sb funny looks/to pull faces

sentences.english: Mary looked at Tom very oddly.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗怪模怪樣地看着湯姆。

sentences.english: That uniform makes them look absurd.
sentences.chinese: 他們穿著那種制服看起來怪模怪樣的。

sentences.english: I now understood his erratic driving a little better: He had narrowly escaped death, and was now blasé about his own mortality.
sentences.chinese: 現在我明白了他爲什麼那樣異出怪樣地開車。
